arguments.description: The x position of the first end of the line.

arguments.description: The y position of the first end of the line.

arguments.description: The x position of the second end of the line.

arguments.description: The y position of the second end of the line.

arguments.description: Any other lines to draw at the same time.
The color of the line(s) (0-15), defaults to the active color.
arguments.name: color
